response.original_title: Phantom: The Rise and the Fall
response.overview: Set in a world where friendships are tested by temptation and betrayal, the story follows characters entangled in the underbelly of crime, addiction, and fleeting youth. Through a lens of nostalgia, the film explores how innocence is lost and morality blurred when the ghosts of the past haunt the present.
response.tagline: The light is coming and with everything we lost
response.title: Phantom: The Rise and the Fall
